definition[0]: a flat piece of plastic, metal etc with a row of thin teeth on one side, used for making your hair tidy
definition[1]: a small flat piece of plastic, metal etc with a row of thin teeth on one side, used for keeping your hair back or for decoration
definition[2]: if you give your hair a comb, you make it tidy using a comb
example[0]: Your hair needs a good comb.
definition[3]: the red piece of flesh that grows on top of a male chickenâ€™s head
definition[5]: to make hair look tidy using a comb
example[1]: Melanie ran upstairs to comb her hair.
example[2]: Police are still combing the woods for the missing boy.
